Class ReservationSystem

java.lang.Object
ReservationSystem
public class ReservationSystem extends Object
The ReservationSystem class represents the model for the reservation system with regards to the MVC architecture. It contains a collection of hotels through which a user can reserve/book a room.

  • Method Details

    • createHotel

      public void createHotel(String name, ArrayList<Integer> roomNum)
      Creates a hotel instance with a given name and adds the it to the hotel list.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the hotel that is being created
      roomNum - the arraylist of integers containing the room numbers for standard, deluxe, and executive room types

    • viewHotelHighLevel

      public String viewHotelHighLevel(int index)
      Returns a string containing high level information of a hotel. Pre-condition: the hotel index provided exists based from the hotel list and is valid.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the hotel in the hotelList
      Returns:
      string containing the information

    • viewHotelAvailableBooked

      public String viewHotelAvailableBooked(int index, int date)
      Returns a string containing the available and booked rooms of a hotel. Pre-condition: the hotel index provided exists based from the hotel list and is valid. The date is within the range of minimum and maximum dates possible.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the hotel in the hotelList
      date - the date whose information to display
      Returns:
      string containing the information

    • viewHotelRoomInfo

      public String viewHotelRoomInfo(int index, String roomName)
      Returns a string containing the room information. Pre-condition: the hotel index provided exists based from the hotel list and is valid. The reservation index is based from the reservation list and is valid
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the hotel in the hotelList
      roomName - the name of the room whose information to display
      Returns:
      string containing the information

    • viewHotelReservationInfo

      public String viewHotelReservationInfo(int index, int reservationIndex)
      Returns a string containing the reservation information. Pre-condition: the hotel index provided exists based from the hotel list and is valid. The reservation index is based from the reservation list and is valid
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the hotel in the hotelList
      reservationIndex - the index of the reservation whose information to display
      Returns:
      string containing the information

    • renameHotel

      public void renameHotel(int index, String newName)
      Sets the name of a hotel given a new name Pre-condition: the hotel index provided exists based from the hotel list and is valid. The new name provided is unique.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the hotel in the hotelList
      newName - the new name to replace the original

    • removeHotel

      public void removeHotel(int index)
      Removes a hotel from the hotel list. Pre-condition: the hotel index provided exists based from the hotel list and is valid.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the hotel in the hotelList.

    • isExisting

      public int isExisting(String name)
      Determines if the hotel name provided is from an existing hotel and returns its index, -1 otherwise.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the hotel to check.
      Returns:
      the index, or -1 if non-existent

    • getHotelList

      public ArrayList<Hotel> getHotelList()
      Returns the hotel list as an arraylist.
      Returns:
      arraylist containing the hotels in the system.
